thread.title: CVS: Buy 1 Get 2 FREE BIG Mars Minis Bags = Only $4.10 Each (Perfect for Stuffing Easter Eggs)
thread.title_full: CVS: Buy 1 Get 2 FREE BIG Mars Minis Bags = Only $4.10 Each (Perfect for Stuffing Easter Eggs)

author: Jessica
title: CVS: Buy 1 Get 2 FREE BIG Mars Minis Bags = Only $4.10 Each (Perfect for Stuffing Easter Eggs)
text:
Does the Easter Bunny need help filling eggs? Through March 25th, CVS has Big Bags of Mars Minis on sale Buy 1 Get TWO FREE when you use your card! Snag a sweet deal on enough candy to fill a LOT of Easter eggs and baskets!
CVS Deal Idea (Thru 3/25): Buy 6 Mars Chocolate Minis 40 oz Bags $13.79 each 
Total after Buy 1 Get 2 FREE = $27.58
Use three $1/2 Minis Mix Variety Bags 10.5 oz or larger coupons found in the 3/12 RP
Final cost $24.58 total – just $4.10 each!
Don’t have the RP insert coupon? 
You can buy 3 bags for only $13.79 total using NO COUPONS! That’s just $4.59 each, which is still an awesome price for these BIG bags!
(Thanks, McKell!)
